dcterms:creator: J. M. Hoekstra
J. Ellerbroek
dcterms:description: An air traffic control simulator that allows for realistic real-time air traffic scenarios, used for performance evaluation of the proposed framework.
dcterms:title: BlueSky environment

dcterms:description: A case study involving three routes with two intersections, designed to evaluate the performance of the multi-agent reinforcement learning framework.
dcterms:title: Case Study 1 (Three routes with two intersections)

dcterms:description: A case study involving two routes merging at one point, aimed at testing the performance of the multi-agent reinforcement learning framework in a merging scenario.
dcterms:title: Case Study 2 (Two routes with one merging point)
